short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides from your facebook/twitter/quora/reddit feeds, any item containing keywords flagged by you. Enjoy unspoiled TV Shows n Movies!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* You have a certain bad luck of hitting spoilers about your favorite TV shows and movies you have been waiting for so long?

* That irritating topic has ruined the web for you?

* There are these people in your network who annoy the heck out of you, but you just can't afford to unfriend them?

Here is an extension which makes internet safe and tolerable in such times. 
Just let it know the keywords you dont want to see. It wipes out any item containing such keyword from your feeds on facebook, twitter, quora, reddit. No login/signup required - just enter the keywords you want to stay away from.

Use it to get rid of spoilers, mute annoying friends, kill endless babbling of your friends on irritating topics.
